name: The Masters Have Subscribed
author: Pass
content: “Cheong-un, parry the attack! Move faster or the obstacle course will kill you!” The progenitors of the great Wudang sect and the mighty Shaolin encounter post-ascension issues when they find themselves reduced to servants in the godly realm. Their only hope and escape from their divine chores lie in the hands of less-than-average Cheong-un, who can hardly beat his peers in the sect. Can the masters raise an average boy into a master of martial arts and finally relieve themselves of their menial
